name: GNG remix - Queen edition
description:
GNG remix - Queen edition (Play as guinevere ) - Tweak of the retro remake by Valarsoft 2006

Ghouls and Ghosts remix is a c++ remake of the classic Ghouls and ghosts with some addiction taken from Ghouls and ghosts, Ghosts and goblins and Super ghouls and ghosts.
